name: CookReference
0:
”Alexa, ask Cook Reference what is the safe temperature for chicken.”
”Alexa, ask Cook Reference how many tablespoons in one cup.”
”Alexa, ask Cook Reference what goes well with beef.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cook reference
des:
UPDATE September, 2017: Now including wine/beer pairings! All meats that are available for temperature reference now also have pairing information. 

Have your Echo in your kitchen? Need to look up information on the fly? This is a helpful skill for quick reference to the safe cooking temperatures for various meats, converting common cooking units and quick reference to wine and beer pairings for meats. Meats include pork, beef, chicken, lamb, turkey and a few fishes. Units include cup, ounce, pint, quart, gallon, teaspoon and tablespoon. 

Pork, beef and lamb all include information on various temperatures for rare, medium-rare etc.

"Alexa, ask cook reference what is the safe temperature for chicken?"

"Alexa, ask cook reference how many ounces are in a gallon?"

"Alexa, ask cook reference what goes well with beef?"


Please leave a review if you enjoyed this skill. Happy cooking!

Note: This skill does not currently contain information for recipes.

This is under construction with more features. If you think of something you would like included, send an email to cookreference@colemanrollins.io with your suggestion!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
